p: Results showed positive correlations between Bsh, Bsk, and Bwh climate and FL, SLA, SD, TP, and leaf photosynthetic pigments, moreover negative correlations with PH, LL, LW, LA, LN, BN, FW, DW, SW, and antioxidant enzymes. In Csa and Cfa climate, the results were the opposite of the above ( Table 6B).
